DOC.brief_summary: Aim : The aim study compare analgesic efficacy two combination opioid non-opioid analgesic acute periradicular abscess . Methodology : This study include 24 patient seek emergency care Brazilian dental school . The patient randomly divide two group : Codeine/Acetaminophen - oral prescription codeine ( 30 mg ) plus acetaminophen ( 500 mg ) , every 4 h , 3 day Tramadol/Acetaminophen - oral prescription tramadol hydrochloride ( 37.5 mg ) plus acetaminophen ( 500 mg ) schedule . Patients record pain score pain diary 6 , 12 , 24 , 48 , 72 h treatment , use Visual Analogue Scale .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Combinations Opioid Non-opioid Analgesics Acute Periradicular Abscess
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Acute Periradicular Abscess Age great 18 year Spontaneous pain great 40 mm measure Visual Analogue Scale ( moderate severe pain ) .
